scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build-darwin: npm run make && npm run build-clean && nexe dist/index.js --resource "./node_modules/koice/dist/msg.json" --name koice --target mac --build --fake-argv --output build/koice-darwin-amd64
scripts.build-win: npm run make && npm run build-clean && nexe dist/index.js --resource "./node_modules/koice/dist/msg.json" --name koice --target windows --build --fake-argv --output build/koice-windows-amd64 --ico assets/icon.ico
scripts.build-linux: npm run make && npm run build-clean && nexe dist/index.js --resource "./node_modules/koice/dist/msg.json" --name koice --target linux --build --fake-argv --output build/koice-linux-amd64
